name: updated_date_time
description: Timestamp when the record was last updated

name: block_number
description: The block number

name: transaction_index
description: The transaction index

name: transaction_hash
description: The transaction hash

name: internal_index
description: The internal index of the trace within the transaction

name: action_from
description: The from address of the action

name: action_to
description: The to address of the action

name: action_value
description: The value of the action

name: action_gas
description: The gas provided for the action

name: action_input
description: The input data for the action

name: action_call_type
description: The call type of the action

name: action_init
description: The initialization code for the action

name: action_reward_type
description: The reward type for the action

name: action_type
description: The type of the action

name: result_gas_used
description: The gas used in the result

name: result_output
description: The output of the result

name: result_code
description: The code returned in the result

name: result_address
description: The address returned in the result

name: trace_address
description: The trace address

name: subtraces
description: The number of subtraces

name: error
description: The error, if any, in the trace

name: meta_network_id
description: Ethereum network ID

name: meta_network_name
description: Ethereum network name
